plugin.name: dccp
plugin.description: transfer data over the network via DCCP.

element.name: dccpclientsink
element.description: Send data as a client over the network via DCCP
element.author: E-Phone Team at Federal University of Campina Grande <leandroal@gmail.com>

element.name: dccpclientsrc
element.description: Receive data as a client over the network via DCCP
element.author: E-Phone Team at Federal University of Campina Grande <leandroal@gmail.com>

element.name: dccpserversink
element.description: Send data as a server over the network via DCCP
element.author: E-Phone Team at Federal University of Campina Grande <leandroal@gmail.com>

element.name: dccpserversrc
element.description: Receive data as a server over the network via DCCP
element.author: E-Phone Team at Federal University of Campina Grande <leandroal@gmail.com>
